column1:
3.3.1	
Summary of evidence and recommendations for bladder diaries
Validated condition-specific symptom scores assist in the screening for and categorisation of LUTS.
Validated symptom scores measure the severity of UI and LUTS.

Both condition-specific and general health status questionnaires measure current health status and 
change following treatment.

Patient questionnaires cannot replace a detailed patient consultation and should only be used as part 
of a complete medical history.
